metadata.title: CVE-2016-9276 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
The dwarf_get_aranges_list function in dwarf_arrange.c in Libdwarf before20161124 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(out-of-bounds read).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9276` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dwarfdump - 20161124-1
libdwarf1 - 20161124-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dwarfutils package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20161124-1').
